title: U.S. government - Budget surplus or deficit 2000 to 2025
summary: In general Surplus/deficit in trillion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Surplus/deficit in trillion U.S. dollars is roughly constant from '14 to '15, and finally slightly increasing from '15 to '18.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year '15 and '16.
Maximum Surplus/deficit in trillion U.S. dollars, about 0.78 was reported at Year '18
The lowest Surplus/deficit in trillion U.S. dollars, of value 0.44 was reported at Year '15
